short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. \\n \\n Item 1, GSIN: 6145, NSN 6145-20-A0D-7573 CABLE,SPECIAL PURPOSE,12 TWISTED PAIRS  \\n Part No.:  FRCL100207A,  \\n Quantity: 1100, Unit of Issue: Meter to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia \\n \\n Item 2, GSIN: 6145, NSN 6145-20-A0D-7573 CABLE,SPECIAL PURPOSE,12 TWISTED PAIRS  \\n Part No.: FRCL100207A,  \\n Quantity: 900, Unit of Issue: Meter to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia \\n  \\n \\n Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the  NCAGE  they are offering.  \\n  \\n The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods.  \\n \\n Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.  \\n \\n The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.  \\n  \\n Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.``
full_summary:
==================================="
### Tender Notice
================================>>>( NSN: 6145-20-A0D-7573 - CABLE, SPECIAL PURPOSE )

================================ LICITATION NOTIFICATIONS================================='')
### Généralités
================================>>>( Câble, application spéciale )

================================>>> _Quantité requis_
================================[]>
- **NSN** : 6145-20-A0D-7573 CABLE, SPECIAL PURPOSE
- **Description** : 
The Department of National Defence is initiating a solicitation for the supply of specialized cable and accessories. The items required are detailed below:

* Item 1: 
  - **GSIN** : 6145
  - **NSN** : 6145-20-A0D-7573
  - **Quantity** : 1100 Meters
  - **Delivery Location** : CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: 
  - **GSIN** : 6145
  - **NSN** : 6145-20-A0D-7573
  - **Quantity** : 900 Meters
  - **Delivery Location** : CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

 Suppliers may submit equivalent or substitute products, and must indicate the brand name, model, and Part Number, and the National Codification of Suppliers and Services (NCAGE) number.

 ```
